Line.speaker: eddie
Line.str: You felt that? I wonder what it was.

Line.speaker: lance
Line.str: Making up excuses now Shortie? If you can't open it, just say it. We won't think any less of you for it. Cuz you know, we can't.

Line.speaker: eddie
Line.str: Don't make me shove the lockpick up your nose fatass!

Line.speaker: sam
Line.str: Just shut up you two!

Line.speaker: eddie
Line.str: Aaaand... open sesame. I can't wait to be rid of you two. Let's go!

Line.speaker: lance
Line.str: Hey, we don't want trouble, just let us pass!

Line.speaker: prisoner1
Line.str: grrrrr

Line.speaker: sam
Line.str: I guess they want trouble.

Line.speaker: lance
Line.str: Let's give it to them, then!

Line.speaker: eddie
Line.str: And here I was, thinking we could just make a smooth escape.

Line.speaker: lance
Line.str: The whole yard is up in arms...

Line.speaker: sam
Line.str: Well, I guess we will have to fight our way through them as well. You two are pretty good at that anyway.

Line.speaker: eddie
Line.str: Once we get over the bridge, we can finally escape for real.

Line.speaker: cityguard
Line.str: grrrr... rar... grrrr...

Line.speaker: lance
Line.str: Something is wrong, we need to figure out what's going on.

Line.speaker: eddie
Line.str: Aw, gimme a break!

Line.speaker: eddie
Line.str: Okay, I want my guns back and I guess you want your stuff too. Let's rob the armory!

Line.speaker: lance
Line.str: No time, the tower in front of us houses the city council. Maybe they didn't go crazy, maybe they have answers.

Line.speaker: eddie
Line.str: Or maybe they would just shove us back into prison if they see 3 escaped convicts run in there.

Line.speaker: sam
Line.str: I have to agree with Eddie here. If we want to escape alive, we need our equipment first.

Line.speaker: lance
Line.str: Okay, but we still go to the tower after.

Line.speaker: clumsyEn
Line.str: No, you not take Clumsy, guards! Guards!

Line.speaker: sam
Line.str: Wait... damn!

Line.speaker: clumsyEn
Line.str: Hehhhh... hehhhh... hhheeeee... you no take Clumsy's gear, crazy rodents!

Line.speaker: sam
Line.str: Calm down, it was our gear originally anyway.

Line.speaker: clumsyEn
Line.str: Mouse lady can speak full sentence? Clumsy sorry! Clumsy was scared in all this madness.

Line.speaker: eddie
Line.str: So scared, you went ahead and robbed a highly protected armory?

Line.speaker: clumsyEn
Line.str: Clumsy want shiny armor to protect Clumsy!

Line.speaker: eddie
Line.str: It's okay Clumsy, I'm sure this piece of lard will let you keep his armor.

Line.speaker: lance
Line.str: Over my dead body.

Line.speaker: clumsyEn
Line.str: Clumsy could also just take jacket.

Line.speaker: eddie
Line.str: Um, no.

Line.speaker: clumsyEn
Line.str: Clumsy will surely perish alone.

Line.speaker: sam
Line.str: You can tag along if you want to.

Line.speaker: clumsyEn
Line.str: Yay, Clumsy thanks you, mouse lady.

Line.speaker: lance
Line.str: To the tower!

Line.speaker: cityguard
Line.str: Stop right there!

Line.speaker: lance
Line.str: Finally, some sane guards! Please, let us through, we need to talk to the council!

Line.speaker: cityguard
Line.str: The council does not wish to talk to escaped convicts.

Line.speaker: eddie
Line.str: What a surprise.

Line.speaker: godfrey
Line.str: What is the meaning of this intrusion? Lancelot? You traitorous scum, how dare you barge in here with your gang? Explain yourself!

Line.speaker: lance
Line.str: I'm sorry, High Abbot, but I never betrayed anyone, I did what I felt was right. As for why I am here, people are going crazy around here. Care to explain why?

Line.speaker: godfrey
Line.str: The council does not to talk to escaped convicts. Maxwell, let us disperse this rabble.

Line.speaker: maxwellEn
Line.str: Right away, sir! I'm sorry Lance, but you forced my hand by barging into the armory and attacking my guards.

Line.speaker: godfrey
Line.str: What is the meaning of this intrusion? Lancelot? You traitorous scum, how dare you barge in here with your gang? Explain yourself!

Line.speaker: lance
Line.str: I'm sorry, High Abbot, but I never betrayed anyone, I did what I felt was right. As for why I am here, people are going crazy around here. Care to explain why?

Line.speaker: godfrey
Line.str: The council does not to talk to escaped convicts. Maxwell, let us disperse this rabble.

Line.speaker: maxwellEn
Line.str: No can do, sir! Lance and his people might still be needed.

Line.speaker: godfrey
Line.str: Is that your last word Maxwell? Have you gone mad too? Very well then, I'll have your head too.

Line.speaker: godfrey
Line.str: Stand down, you win, I'll give you what you want. One moment everything was fine, then we felt a small shockwave and the whole city went up in flames. We tried to contain this madness, to no success, so we barricaded ourselves in here.

Line.speaker: eddie
Line.str: So that's what I felt before we escaped.

Line.speaker: godfrey
Line.str: We need your help Lancelot. Everyone outside seemed to have gone mad, we only have a few troops left.

Line.speaker: lance
Line.str: Alright, what do you need us to do?

Line.speaker: godfrey
Line.str: I'll give you a few soldiers and I need you to reach a Seeker. There are two seekers nearby, I need you to locate one of them, they will know what is really happening. Do this, and you will all recieve a full pardon.

Line.speaker: lance
Line.str: Will do, High Abbot!

Line.speaker: godfrey
Line.str: Good luck, Lancelot! You will need it.
